article_title: Prospects And Challenges For The U.S. Economy In 2016

article_metadata.description: Except for the continued costs of the regulatory state and high corporate tax rates, when we balance all of the above we see a picture with better economic fundamentals than in 2015. Higher political uncertainty and a more complicated and unstable world scene, with lower growth and increased cronyism, will lead to another mediocre 2 percent–plus economic growth environment.
article_metadata.author: Alejandro Chafuen
